title: Compare Realism of Courbet and Millet

content.description:
LEFT: © Musée d’Orsay, Paris, France / The Bridgeman Art Library

RIGHT: © Scala / Art Resource, NY
content.question: The works were painted by two different artists associated with the nineteenth-century movement called Realism.Using specific evidence, analyze how the works reflect the artists’ contrasting views of Realism.

frqParts.text: The works were painted by two different artists associated with the nineteenth-century movement called Realism.Using specific evidence, analyze how the works reflect the artists’ contrasting views of Realism.

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
